entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.8°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 73 %

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
